alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 6:36PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Evangeline, south central Avoyelles and northeastern St. Landry Parishes through 700 PM CST... At 636 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Prairie Ronde, or 8 miles south of Ville Platte, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Opelousas, Ville Platte, Palmetto, Morrow, Washington, Goudeau, Prairie Ronde, Lawtell, Whiteville, Big Cane, Dupont, Grand Prairie and Lebeau. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 24 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for central Louisiana.
